about_the_game:
About this Game:

From Hell is a first-person psychological horror game. The game takes place inside an abandoned psychiatric hospital. Alex, the director of a program about paranormal events, has sent his team to record one of the episodes in this place. Having not heard from them for several days, he has decided to go there to see what is happening. Once at the hospital, Alex will have to look for his colleagues and check if they are still alive or not. It is possible that what he finds in that place is not just his companions.

From Hellis a first-person psychological horror game.

Environment

Under a tense and dark atmosphere, the player will be able to experience fear firsthand. Something has happened in this sinister place and you must discover and complete its story by achieving a series of objectives. The question is whether he can achieve it or not, the evil forces will not make it easy for him, his life is in danger.

The theme of the game

The game takes place inside a psychiatric hospital, to which our protagonist has had to go to look for his friends. What he discovers next will be something terrifying that he would never have imagined.

Developer comment:
The supernatural entity in this game may not harm you physically, but they can harm your psychology. It is our recommendation for people who have fear of the dark, heart problems and fear of being alone. Play with caution.
